channel.title: Lego on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Lego on Butterfly Dream

item.title: How Boba Fett Escaped the Sarlacc Pit
item.description: Where a fan goes the extra mile: Stoefller submitted the diorama for French lego contest, along with a fantastical story that offers an alternate take on how Boba survived falling into the Sarlacc during Return of the Jedi. The detail is just astonishing. You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter

item.title: The Lego Movie
item.description: With a 96% critics rating and a 92% audience rating, you know this movie has done something right. It is a family movie, so go in obviously expecting that. But given that, I enjoyed it more than I ever imagined. The little details, the references. The way the references were handled, even the overall main and underlying stories; typical as they were, were pretty good. Not all entertainment needs to be vulgar to make it big.
